snippet: Syria’s Internet and cellphone access resumed Wednesday morning after a failure took the country offline on Tuesday. Technologists say the outage was most likely deliberately caused by the Syrian government, but the government said the failure was...
abstract: Syria’s Internet and cellphone access resumed Wednesday morning after a failure took the country offline on Tuesday. Technologists say the outage was most likely deliberately caused by the Syrian government, but the government said the failure was because of a technical problem.

headline.main: Syria, and Pro-Government Hackers, Are Back on the Internet

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
